[data-ref=excelExportBtn1].title: Export with default settings
[data-ref=excelExportBtn1].content: Settings are taken automatically from the Scheduler locked columns

[data-ref=excelExportBtn2].title: Export with custom settings
[data-ref=excelExportBtn2].content: Configured in the buttons handler. Starts and Ends columns are 140px width.

[data-ref=excelExportBtn3].title: Export all event fields
[data-ref=excelExportBtn3].content: Configured in the buttons handler. Gets all non-persisted fields from the event model. Headers are not specified.
